Posts.Content: Thank you very much for your response.. that is comforting to hear those stats. I'll let her know cause she is very, very scared considering that our Aunt just passed from cancer 2 months ago.
Posts.Title: Going in for spot magnification of breast density.. question please?

Posts.Content: Hey... My sis(35yrs) recently had a mamogram done and then was called back in for a second one. The doc said that he saw something "suspicious" that he wants to take a closer look at so he he now wants her to come in once again(in 3 weeks) for a "spot magnification of breast density"? Not to familiar with what that is or what is involved so I am wondering if this is something to be concerned about or is this just a precautionary measure. My Aunt recently passed from liver cancer but it started in her breast(which was removed)... she is the only female in our family to have breast cancer but I am wondering if the doctor is taking more measures to be safe because of the family history or is this something that I need to worry about. Any info from you girls/guys would be much appreciated. Thanks!
Posts.Title: Going in for spot magnification of breast density.. question please?
